history.proof: intros. unfold ex_lim in *. qsimpl use: ex_lim. exists l. srun best use: is_lim_ext.

exceptions.tactic: intros g f x Hf Hlimf.
intros g' f x Hf Hlimf.
intros g' f' x Hf Hlimf.
intros g' f' x' Hf Hlimf.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hlimf was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: apply (is_lim_ext f g x l Hf Hlimf).
exceptions.exn: The reference Hlimf was not found in the current environment.

original: intros g f x Hf Hlimf. unfold ex_lim in *. unfold ex_lim in Hlimf. destruct Hlimf as [l Hlimf]. exists l. apply (is_lim_ext f g x l Hf Hlimf).
